exercise.title: 06.07 Study Grant
exercise.p: Finnish students receive study grant and additional housing supplement (opintotuki: opintoraha+asumislisa) from government organization Kela. The study grant (opintoraha) is defined based on the following (simplified) rules:

tr.td: 20 years or older student who lives independently
20 years or older student living with parents

exercise.p: Make a program that shows the size of the study grant.
